author: cschoett
msg: Minor fix for the JdbcControlChecker - it seems that a bug in the Eclipse APT implementation was causing an improper check result for a JDBC control method which returns an Java Iterator type.

author: sichen
msg: Run the createInvoicesForX services as system when shipments are updated.  Shippers and packers might not have accounting permissions to create an invoice.

msg: New test for testing \s class was added. Inspired by HARMONY-3360.
